titles.title: A bill for the relief of Jerome J. Hartmann and Rita J. Hartmann.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Allows two named individuals to file an action against the United States in a U.S. District Court with respect to a claim for flood damage suffered by them.
